docs.snippet: Ali was the most thrilling if not the best heavyweight boxer of all time, a towering figure with an agile mind who was both admired and vilified for his religious, political and social stances....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ali was the most thrilling if not the best heavyweight boxer of all time, a towering figure with an agile mind who was both admired and vilified for his religious, political and social stances.
docs.abstract: Muhammad Ali, legendary boxer whose unorthodox style and charisma upended boxing, and whose social, religious and political stances earned him as many enemies as it did allies and friends, dies at age 74.

headline.main: Muhammad Ali Dies at 74: Titan of Boxing and the 20th Century
headline.print_headline: Muhammad Ali, Titan of Boxing, Dies at 74
